title: 5 Barriers to Engaging Volunteers - Episode 71
itunes:title: 5 Barriers to Engaging Volunteers - Episode 71
description:
Every church could use more volunteers. They're crucial to the life of any church. But the truth is, we never seem to have enough for all of the needs our churches have.

In this episode, Tony Morgan and Amy Anderson discuss the 5 Barriers to Engaging Volunteers and how you can get more volunteers so you can increase your impact.

For more resources and to join the conversation, you can visit this episode's show notes at theunstuckgroup.com/episode71.

itunes:subtitle: Here is how you can get more volunteers and increase your impact
